    Created by Majid Golshadi on 4/10/2014.

      int addTask(java.lang.String saveName, java.lang.String url, int chunk, java.lang.String sdCardFolderAddress, boolean overwrite, boolean priority)
      add a new download Task
      boolean delete(int token, boolean deleteTaskFile)
      delete download task from db and if you set deleteTaskFile as true it's go to saved folder and delete that file
      void dispose()
      close db connection if your activity goes to paused or stop state you have to call this method to disconnect from db
      java.util.List<ReportStructure> downloadTasksInSameState(int state)
      it's an report method for return list of download task in same state that developer want as ReportStructure List object
      void init(java.lang.String sdCardFolderAddress, int maxChunks, DownloadManagerListener listener)
      i don't want to force developer to init download manager so i can't get downloadManagerListener at constructor but that way seems better than now
      java.util.List<ReportStructure> lastCompletedDownloads()
      return list of last completed Download tasks in "ReportStructure" style you can use it as notifier
      boolean notifiedTaskChecked()
      check all notified tasks so in another "lastCompletedDownloads" call ,completed task does not show again persian: "lastCompletedDownloads" list akharin task haii ke takmil shodeand ra namayesh midahad ba seda zadan in method tamami task haii ke dar gozaresh e ghabli elam shode boodand ra az liste "lastCompeletedDownloads" hazf mikonad !!!

      pause separate download task
      void pauseQueueDownload()
      pause queue download

      report task download status in "ReportStructure" style

      first of all check task state and depend on start download process from where ever need

    • 方法详细资料

      • init

        public void init(java.lang.String sdCardFolderAddress,
        int maxChunks,
        DownloadManagerListener listener)

        i don't want to force developer to init download manager so i can't get downloadManagerListener at constructor but that way seems better than now

        参数:
        sdCardFolderAddress -
        maxChunks -
        listener -

      • addTask

        public int addTask(java.lang.String saveName,
          java.lang.String url,
          int chunk,
          java.lang.String sdCardFolderAddress,
          boolean overwrite,
          boolean priority)

        add a new download Task

        参数:
        saveName - file name
        url - url file address
        chunk - number of chunks
        sdCardFolderAddress - downloaded file save address
        overwrite - if exist an other file with same name "true" over write that file "false" find new name and save it with new name
        返回:
        id inserted task id

      • addTask

          boolean overwrite,
          boolean priority)

      • startDownload

        public void startDownload(int token)
                   throws java.io.IOException

        first of all check task state and depend on start download process from where ever need

        参数:
        token - now token is download task id
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • startQueueDownload

        public void startQueueDownload(int downloadTaskPerTime,
                      int priority)
                        throws QueueDownloadInProgressException
        参数:

        抛出:
        QueueDownloadInProgressException

      • singleDownloadStatus

        public ReportStructure singleDownloadStatus(int token)
        report task download status in "ReportStructure" style
        参数:
        token - when you add a new download task it's return to you
        返回:

      • downloadTasksInSameState

        public java.util.List<ReportStructure> downloadTasksInSameState(int state)

        it's an report method for return list of download task in same state that developer want as ReportStructure List object

        参数:
        state - 0. get all downloads Status 1. init 2. ready 3. downloading 4. paused 5. download finished 6. end
        返回:

      • lastCompletedDownloads

        public java.util.List<ReportStructure> lastCompletedDownloads()
        return list of last completed Download tasks in "ReportStructure" style you can use it as notifier
        返回:

      • notifiedTaskChecked

        public boolean notifiedTaskChecked()

        check all notified tasks so in another "lastCompletedDownloads" call ,completed task does not show again persian: "lastCompletedDownloads" list akharin task haii ke takmil shodeand ra namayesh midahad ba seda zadan in method tamami task haii ke dar gozaresh e ghabli elam shode boodand ra az liste "lastCompeletedDownloads" hazf mikonad !!!SHIT!!!

        返回:
        true or false

      • delete

        public boolean delete(int token,
             boolean deleteTaskFile)
        delete download task from db and if you set deleteTaskFile as true it's go to saved folder and delete that file
        参数:
        token - when you add a new download task it's return to you
        deleteTaskFile - delete completed download file from sd card if you set it true
        返回:
        "true" if anything goes right "false" if something goes wrong

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        close db connection if your activity goes to paused or stop state you have to call this method to disconnect from db
